description.value:
At 3rd level, as you nudge someone closer to the grave, you can channel the power of death to harm someone else as well. Immediately after you deal your @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-class-features.ZNG4a61hajMEzhb1]{Sneak Attack} damage to a creature on your turn, you can target a second creature that you can see within 30 feet of the first creature. Roll half the number of Sneak Attack dice for your level (round up), and the second creature takes necrotic damage equal to the rollâ€™s total, as wails of the dead sound around them for a moment.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

activation.condition: When you deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature on your turn
